trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加要处理的事件处理程序委托<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>事件，你可以执行所需的任何其他预处理或完全取消数据库查询。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 因为 SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>类，你可以取消挂起<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>数据库查询，通过设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查和操作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>集合和之前运行查询时访问其他数据库查询属性<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>由公开对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以检查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>方法通过访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: 中使用 SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>方法以提供对访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>运行之前的数据库查询。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可公开可以处理数据操作的过程期间使用基础数据对象的多个事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的事件和关联<xref:System.EventArgs>类和事件处理程序委托。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |EventArgs |EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: 检索的数据之前发生。 |SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: 执行更新或删除操作在插入、 之前发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: 插入、 更新或删除操作完成之后数据检索，发生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref>类，使用指定<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>对象和任何<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: `inputParameters`参数是<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>与方法签名中匹配和通过引用传递的名称/值对的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>对象，表示可取消<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>查询。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象以确定是否可以排序、 分页或行计数请求数据检索操作的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>类来请求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>执行结果集，如对数据进行排序或返回特定的数据子集上的其他相关的数据操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 这些与数据相关的操作都用枚举<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>对象，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>期间指定对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref>创建。
